column6: CIVIL WAR: BLACK PANTHER PART 4 The thrilling conclusion to King T'Challa and Queen Ororo's diplomatic tour! The couple makes their most hazardous stop yet: the CIVIL WAR-ravaged United States, for an interesting meeting with Tony Stark.
column8: | penciller (cover):Manuel Garcia | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Reginald Hudlin | colorist:Matt Milla | inker:Mark Morales
